posts.post_content:
If this would have been printed as a demon from Rakdos for ![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol),  
i would not have had any doubts that this was, in fact, a demon.  
Those chains and the gloomy, fire-lit background seem to suggest  
that the scene takes place somewhere underground.  
  
So i actually wonder if this artwork was originally intended for a Rakdos demon.  
I'm not going to complain though - this is a great beast card.

posts.post_content:
Trygon\_Predator: \*NO!\* this is more like the PUPPY DOG of Morgoth or the GRUMPY CAT of Morgoth. >:P  
  
*[RAKDOS THE DEFILER](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=RAKDOS THE DEFILER)*: **I AM A DEMON OF THE ANCIENT WORLD. A CREATURE FAR BEYOND ANY OF YOU. WIELDER OF THE FLAME OF UDUN. YOU SHALL NOT SUMMON ME, PLANESWALKER. I SHALL MERELY STOP SLUMBERING AND SLAY SOME OTHERS BEFORE I SLAY THEE IN THY TURN, AND RETURN TO REST IN THE DEEP PLACES, UNDISTURBED UNTIL THE BREAKING OF THE WORLD.**  
  
that said, the Gruul do make a nice Beast. ^^ It simply is Not A Demon. :D
